title: Investing In Technology, ESG, And The Markets
itunes:title: Investing In Technology, ESG, And The Markets
description:
Neesha Hathi, Chief Digital Officer for Charles Schwab, discusses their Investing in technology study. James Katz, Founder and CEO of Humankind Investments, discusses ESG investing. Rich Steinberg, Chief Market Strategist at The Colony Group, talks markets and investing. Philip Palumbo, Founder, CEO, & Chief Investment Officer for Palumbo Wealth Management talks markets. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Kailey Leinz.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
